about_the_game:
Note: This content is also included in the "FAIRY TAIL Season Pass" that is available as a separate purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
Note: Each content item can be enjoyed by advancing the game to a certain point.

A set that adds special requests that are more difficult than those in the main game.

Included Content:
●S-Rank Requests
Allows 3 varieties of S-Rank Requests to be taken on.

●10-Year Quest
Allows 1 10-Year Quest to be taken on.

●100-Year Quest
Allows 1 100-Year Quest to be taken on.

Note: The contents are unlocked during the epilogue, episode 6, and can be accepted from the request board.
